prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt for video generation. Max 2500 characters.

end_image.title: End Image
end_image.description: Last frame image. Requires start_image. Supports .jpg/.jpeg/.png, max 10MB, min 300px.

start_image.title: Start Image
start_image.description: First frame image. Supports .jpg/.jpeg/.png, max 10MB, min 300px, aspect ratio 1:2.5 to 2.5:1.

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio. Ignored when start_image is provided.

multi_prompt.title: Multi Prompt
multi_prompt.description: JSON array of shot definitions for multi-shot mode. Each shot: {"prompt": "...", "duration": N}. Max 6 shots, min 1s per shot, total must equal duration.

generate_audio.title: Generate Audio
generate_audio.description: Generate native audio for the video.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Things you do not want to see in the video. Max 2500 characters.
